subject: BUG: User Activity endpoint using wrong collection for login data
body:
The User Logins page in CALOPS shows all users as 'Never Logged In' even though they have.

ROOT CAUSE:
Admin_UserActivity.js (line 58) does $lookup on collection 'userlogintrack', but login events are actually stored in 'UserLoginHistory' collection (as used by Analytics_LoginHistory.js).

FIX NEEDED:
Change line 58 in Admin_UserActivity.js from:
  from: 'userlogintrack'
to:
  from: 'UserLoginHistory'

Also verify the join field - currently uses 'firebaseUserId' but UserLoginHistory also has this field so it should work.

This affects the CALOPS User Logins page showing wrong data for all users.
